CustomProperties.Name: MaxDate
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Specifies the maximum date that users can select in the date picker.

CustomProperties.Name: MinDate
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Specifies the minimum date that users can select in the date picker.

CustomProperties.Name: IsOnSubmitEnabled
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A Boolean property that determines whether to reset the component's error state after a form submission.

CustomProperties.Name: DefaultYear
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Use this property to set a default year when year selection is disabled in the component.

CustomProperties.Name: DefaultDay
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Use this property to set a default day when day selection is disabled in the component.

CustomProperties.Name: MinimumHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The minimum height the component should be to display correctly.

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
DateValue(
    If(
        CompDate.IsDayEnabled,
        "31",
        CompDate.DefaultDay
    ) & "/12/" & If(
        CompDate.IsYearEnabled,
        "9999",
        CompDate.DefaultYear
    )
)

DateValue(
            If(
                CompDate.IsDayEnabled,
                "01",
                CompDate.DefaultDay
            ) & "/01/" & If(
                CompDate.IsYearEnabled,
                "1900",
                CompDate.DefaultYear
            )
        )

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        CompDate.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
   RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        CompDate.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "defaultLabelColorValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        CompDate.Theme,
        cat_name = "defaultLabelColorValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        CompDate.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        CompDate.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    !IsNumeric(
        LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "TextBodyFontSizeValue"
        ).cat_value
    ) || IsBlankOrError(
        LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "TextBodyFontSizeValue"
        ).cat_value
    ),
    16,
    LookUp(
        CompDate.Theme,
        cat_name = "TextBodyFontSizeValue"
    ).cat_value)

If((Self.Visible && !contMonth.Visible && contDay.Visible), contDay.X + contDay.Width + lblDateTitle.X, Self.Visible,contMonth.X + contMonth.Width + lblDateTitle.X,

0)

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            CompDate.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        CompDate.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
    ).cat_value))
